greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1, a(p(k)) = p(k+1) mod 4 for k-th prime p(k) and a(u * v) = a(u) * a(v) for u, v > 0.
comment: This is a fully multiplicative sequence. Only powers of 3 (A000244) occur as terms.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10080
program: A246269(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = (nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)%4)); factorback(f);
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 21 2014
